mapper.select: SELECT M.NO, D.NAME AS DEPARTMENT_NAME, P.NAME AS POSITION_NAME, M.NAME, M.EMAIL FROM MEMBER M JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON M.DEPARTMENT_NO = D.NO JOIN POSITION P ON P.NO = M.POSITION_NO WHERE M.NAME= #{name} AND STATUS = 'O'
SELECT M.NO, D.NAME AS DEPARTMENT_NAME, P.NAME AS POSITION_NAME, M.NAME, M.EMAIL FROM MEMBER M JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON M.DEPARTMENT_NO = D.NO JOIN POSITION P ON P.NO = M.POSITION_NO WHERE STATUS = 'O'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MAIL(NO, MAIL_TITLE, MAIL_CONTENT) VALUES(SEQ_MAIL_NO.NEXTVAL, #{mailTitle}, #{mailContent})
INSERT INTO SENDER_MAIL(NO, SENDER_NO, MAIL_NO) VALUES(SEQ_SENDER_MAIL_NO.NEXTVAL, #{senderNo}, SEQ_MAIL_NO.CURRVAL)
INSERT INTO RECEIVER_MAIL(NO, RECEIVER_NO, MAIL_NO) VALUES(SEQ_RECEIVER_MAIL_NO.NEXTVAL, #{receiverNo}, SEQ_MAIL_NO.CURRVAL)
INSERT INTO MAIL_ATTACHMENT(NO, MAIL_NO, ATTACH_NAME, FILE_PATH) VALUES(SEQ_MAIL_ATTACHMENT_NO.NEXTVAL, SEQ_MAIL_NO.CURRVAL, #{attachName}, #{filePath})
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(R.NO) FROM RECEIVER_MAIL R JOIN MAIL M ON M.NO = R.MAIL_NO JOIN SENDER_MAIL S ON S.MAIL_NO = M.NO JOIN MEMBER MR ON MR.NO = S.SENDER_NO WHERE R.RECEIVER_NO = #{receiverNo} AND R.STATUS = 'O'
AND MR.NAME LIKE '%${searchValue}%'

SELECT M.NO, M.MAIL_TITLE, M.MAIL_ENROLL_DATE, MR.NAME AS SENDER_NAME FROM MAIL M JOIN RECEIVER_MAIL R ON M.NO = R.MAIL_NO JOIN SENDER_MAIL S ON S.MAIL_NO = M.NO JOIN MEMBER MR ON MR.NO = S.SENDER_NO WHERE R.RECEIVER_NO = #{receiverNo} AND R.STATUS = 'O'
AND MR.NAME LIKE '%${searchValue}%'
ORDER BY M.NO DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE RECEIVER_MAIL SET STATUS = 'X' WHERE MAIL_NO = #{mailNo}
mapper.select: SELECT M.NO, M.MAIL_TITLE, M.MAIL_CONTENT, M.MAIL_ENROLL_DATE, S.SENDER_NO, SENDER.NAME AS SENDER_NAME, RECEIVER.NAME AS RECEIVER_NAME, S.STATUS AS SENDER_MAIL_STATUS, R.RECEIVER_NO, R.STATUS AS RECEIVER_MAIL_STATUS, R.MAIL_YN AS RECEIVER_MAIL_YN, A.NO AS MAIL_ATTACHMENT_NO, A.ATTACH_NAME, A.FILE_PATH, SENDER.EMAIL AS SENDER_MAIL, RECEIVER.EMAIL AS RECEIVER_MAIL FROM MAIL M LEFT JOIN SENDER_MAIL S ON S.MAIL_NO = M.NO LEFT JOIN RECEIVER_MAIL R ON M.NO = R.MAIL_NO LEFT JOIN MAIL_ATTACHMENT A ON A.MAIL_NO = M.NO LEFT JOIN MEMBER SENDER ON SENDER.NO = S.SENDER_NO LEFT JOIN MEMBER RECEIVER ON RECEIVER.NO = R.RECEIVER_NO WHERE M.NO = #{no}
mapper.update: UPDATE SENDER_MAIL SET STATUS = 'X' WHERE MAIL_NO = #{mailNo}

SELECT M.NO, M.MAIL_TITLE, M.MAIL_ENROLL_DATE, MR.NAME AS RECEIVER_NAME FROM MAIL M JOIN RECEIVER_MAIL R ON M.NO = R.MAIL_NO JOIN SENDER_MAIL S ON S.MAIL_NO = M.NO JOIN MEMBER MR ON MR.NO = R.RECEIVER_NO WHERE S.SENDER_NO = #{senderNo} AND S.STATUS = 'O'
AND MR.NAME LIKE '%${searchValue}%'
ORDER BY M.NO DESC
